attributes.review:
I downloaded this app when in a dream junkook oppar and jaehyun oppar told me to get the app but the when I registered my number in the app I kept getting sent pictures of naked Danny Devito ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°), I mean I wasn’t mad but then one day my grandma saw the messages and she had a heart attack now she’s dead, also I found out that Trump doesn’t stan loona 😤

- wonho’s tiddie milk 💞
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP🧚💗💞❤️🥰

attributes.review: I was gonna rate it zero but it only let be do 1?? Seems like voter suppression idk?? This app is terrible I thought it was gonna make things great again but then it started revealing how things were never great and how they actually just liked when it was easier to be oppressive to minority groups??
attributes.title: Very confused

attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, my quality of life has dropped SIGNIFICANTLY. My wife left me, she took the kids, my dog ran away, my house caught fire, I was hit by a car, and the FBI is currently hunting me down. This all within the first 10 seconds I downloaded this app. DO NOT get this app, it most definitely left a CURSE on me!!! Again, DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!
attributes.title: This app ruined my life

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting campaign info but it is a total scam, it isn’t run by donald trump at all, they stole my phone number and keep sending me annoying and misleading texts. Please remove this app from the app store so others don’t face this mess. For anyone reading, do not download this app, it’s fake and very unprofessional.
attributes.title: Total Scam

attributes.review: I got this app to show my love ❤️ for our cheeto puff president 🔸✨ but unfortunately ❌ when I got on the app 📱 I saw a horrifying image 👹 of a clown 🤡 I am so scared of clowns 😨 I had a heart attack 💔 the Doctor said I barely made it 👩‍⚕️☹ DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 🧚‍♀️✨💕💗(also stan bts, black pink, twice, got7, exo, mamamoo, txt, Big bang, 2ne1, day6, stray kids, itzy, nct, ateez, red velvet, girls generation, Pentagon, and kpop in general)🌌💕🧚‍♀️❤️
attributes.title: I almost DIED😭😫🤬🤧

attributes.review:
As a Gen Zer, I got this app to support my Prez. But as soon as I did, I got extreme explosive diarrhea!!!!🤢🤮🤮🤮💩💩💩. I had to do to the E.R., where they couldn’t stop it!!!! So I undownloaded and then my diarrhea stopped, but now I have thousands and thousands dollars worth of medical bills. 
It’s all so sad, plus, Trump is now deceased. RIP, fly high buddy
On the off and note, who was tacos?!??😁
attributes.title: Causes Diarrhea!!!

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I didn’t expect anything bad to happen. But then a bunch of fart clouds started popping up on my phone, EVEN WHEN I WASN'T USING THE APP. I tried to get my phone inspected, but they said that trumps team has implanted the irritable bowel syndrome virus IN MY PHONE. 1/10, do not recommend.
attributes.title: The government is now spying on me

attributes.review: I got this app when I was a teenager now I’m in my late 40s and it finally download! When I got on it hacked my phone and I had to get a new phone just because how slow everything was, and my phone was fine until I got that app! Definitely 1 star if I can I’ll give it zero starts!!
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app. I wanted to stay up to date and support our dear peach #trump2020. Unfortunately the app took 12 hours to download. THEN IT USED UP ALL MY DATA!!!!! 😡😡😡 I deleted it after only having it on my phone for a week. Don’t waste your time with this mediocre app. Absolutely RIDICULOUS!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Disappointed
